headline: PPG recognized on Financial Times 'Europe's Best Employers 2025' list
summary: PITTSBURGH - PPG today announced that it has been recognized as one of 'Europe's Best Employers 2025' by the Financial Times.The list includes companies that are highly recommended by their own...
